sentences.en: As long as I deliver the goods, my boss is very happy.
sentences.cn: 只要我做好本职工作，我的老板就很高兴。

sentences.en: As the boss began to rant, I stood up and went out.
sentences.cn: 老板开始咆哮的时候，我起身走了出去。

sentences.en: Being boss of a software firm beats selling insurance.
sentences.cn: 当软件公司的老板比卖保险强多了。

sentences.en: Five-year-old girls love to boss people around.
sentences.cn: 五岁的女孩就爱支使别人。

sentences.en: He seemed to be in direct contact with the Boss.
sentences.cn: 他似乎直接和老板联系。

sentences.en: Her boss took her under his wing after fully realizing her potential.
sentences.cn: 老板充分意识到她的潜力后，对她关怀备至。

sentences.en: I’ll have to ask my boss for a day off.
It was clear to me that he respected his boss.
sentences.cn: 在我看来他显然很尊重他的上司。

sentences.en: Jackson said her boss became increasingly depressed and reverted to smoking heavily.
sentences.cn: 杰克逊说她的老板情绪越来越低落，又开始拼命抽烟了。

sentences.en: Johnson's easy charm contrasted sharply with the prickliness of his boss.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊的亲和力和他老板易怒的性格形成了鲜明的对比。

sentences.en: Occasionally I have to go and ask the boss for a rise.
sentences.cn: 有时我不得不找老板要求加薪。

sentences.en: Please give this to your boss with my compliments.
sentences.cn: 请把这个给你的老板，算是我的一点心意。

sentences.en: Since I’m my own boss (=  I work for myself, rather than for an employer  ) , my hours are flexible.
sentences.cn: 我自己当老板，所以我的时间很灵活。

sentences.en: So you fancy yourself as the boss someday?
sentences.cn: 这么说，你是想有一天自己当上老板喽？

sentences.en: The boss retains enormous influence by reason of his position.
sentences.cn: 老板由于自身的地位而一直有极大的影响力。

sentences.en: Tim hemmed and hawed, but finally told his boss the truth.
sentences.cn: 蒂姆起初支支吾吾，但最终还是把真相告诉了老板。

sentences.en: To his acolytes, he is known simply as "the Boss".
sentences.cn: 他被手下人简称为“老板”。

sentences.en: You heard what the boss said, bud.
sentences.cn: 你听见老板说的话了，老兄。

words.tran_cn: 专横的；浮雕装饰的；爱指挥他人的
领袖的政党控制；头领的支配

phrases.tran_cn: 雨果·波士（德国著名服装品牌）
让别人明白是自己说了算

trans.tran_en: the person who employs you or who is in charge of you at work
to tell people to do things, give them orders etc, especially when you have no authority to do it
